verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הַחֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> This month הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> This לָכֶ֖ם רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> [shall be] unto you the beginning חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> of months רִאשׁ֥וֹן <WH7223> it [shall be] the first הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לָכֶ֔ם לְחָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH2320> month הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> of the year

דַּבְּר֗וּ <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> ye unto all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בֶּעָשֹׂ֖ר <WH6218> In the tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of this month הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this וְיִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> they shall take לָהֶ֗ם אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> to them every man שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> a lamb לְבֵית־ <WH1004> according to the house אָבֹ֖ת <WH1> of [their] fathers שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> a lamb לַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> for an house

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if יִמְעַ֣ט <WH4591> too little הַבַּיִת֮ <WH1004> And if the household מִהְיֹ֣ת <WH1961> be מִשֶּׂה֒ <WH7716> for the lamb וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> take ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וּשְׁכֵנ֛וֹ <WH7934> let him and his neighbour הַקָּרֹ֥ב <WH7138> next אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> unto his house בְּמִכְסַ֣ת <WH4373> [it] according to the number נְפָשֹׁ֑ת <WH5315> of the souls אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man לְפִ֣י <WH6310> according אָכְל֔וֹ <WH400> to his eating תָּכֹ֖סּוּ <WH3699> shall make your count עַל־ <WH5921> and הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <WH7716> for the lamb

שֶׂ֥ה <WH7716> Your lamb תָמִ֛ים <WH8549> shall be without blemish זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> a male בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם מִן־ <WH4480> from הַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> [it] out from the sheep וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> or from the goats תִּקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> ye shall take

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become לָכֶם֙ לְמִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <WH4931> And ye shall keep עַ֣ד <WH5704> until אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the same month הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of the same וְשָׁחֲט֣וּ <WH7819> shall kill אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> and the whole קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> assembly עֲדַֽת־ <WH5712> of the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֵּ֥ין <WH996> it in הָעַרְבָּֽיִם׃ <WH6153> the evening

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> And they shall take מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of the blood וְנָֽתְנ֛וּ <WH5414> and strike עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> [it] on the two הַמְּזוּזֹ֖ת <WH4201> side posts וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הַמַּשְׁק֑וֹף <WH4947> and on the upper door post עַ֚ל <WH5921> of הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <WH1004> of the houses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> wherein they shall eat אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בָּהֶֽם׃

וְאָכְל֥וּ <WH398> And they shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> the flesh בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> in that night הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> he צְלִי־ <WH6748> roast אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> with fire וּמַצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> and unleavened bread עַל־ <WH5921> and מְרֹרִ֖ים <WH4844> [and] with bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <WH398> [herbs] they shall eat

אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּאכְל֤וּ <WH398> Eat מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> any נָ֔א <WH4995> not of it raw וּבָשֵׁ֥ל <WH1311> sodden מְבֻשָּׁ֖ל <WH1310> boiled בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> at all with water כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo צְלִי־ <WH6748> but roast אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> [with] fire רֹאשׁ֥וֹ <WH7218> his head עַל־ <WH5921> along כְּרָעָ֖יו <WH3767> with his legs וְעַל־ <WH5921> along קִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> and with the purtenance

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תוֹתִ֥ירוּ <WH3498> And ye shall let nothing of it remain מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> any עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> until the morning וְהַנֹּתָ֥ר <WH3498> and that which remaineth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> any עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> of it until the morning בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> with fire תִּשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <WH8313> ye shall burn

וְכָכָה֮ <WH3602> And thus תֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> shall ye eat אֹתוֹ֒ <WH853> מָתְנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH4975> it [with] your loins חֲגֻרִ֔ים <WH2296> girded נַֽעֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5275> your shoes בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7272> on your feet וּמַקֶּלְכֶ֖ם <WH4731> and your staff בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> in your hand וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> and ye shall eat אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בְּחִפָּז֔וֹן <WH2649> it in haste פֶּ֥סַח <WH6453> passover ה֖וּא <WH1931> it לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> it [is] the LORD'S

וְעָבַרְתִּ֣י <WH5674> For I will pass בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> through the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> of Egypt בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> this night הַזֶּה֒ <WH2088> he וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <WH5221> and will smite כָל־ <WH3605> all בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מֵאָדָ֖ם <WH120> both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> and against all the gods מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> I will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgment אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> will befall הַדָּ֨ם <WH1818> And the blood לָכֶ֜ם לְאֹ֗ת <WH226> shall be to you for a token עַ֤ל <WH5921> over הַבָּתִּים֙ <WH1004> upon the houses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> where ye [are] and when I see אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> the blood וּפָסַחְתִּ֖י <WH6452> I will pass עֲלֵכֶ֑ם <WH5921> over וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> will befall בָכֶ֥ם נֶ֙גֶף֙ <WH5063> over you and the plague לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> shall not be upon you to destroy בְּהַכֹּתִ֖י <WH5221> [you] when I smite בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become הַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> And this day הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> now this לָכֶם֙ לְזִכָּר֔וֹן <WH2146> shall be unto you for a memorial וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <WH2287> and ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> חַ֣ג <WH2282> it a feast לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> throughout your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> by an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever תְּחָגֻּֽהוּ׃ <WH2287> ye shall keep it a feast

שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> Seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days מַצּ֣וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> shall ye eat אַ֚ךְ <WH389> even בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> the first תַּשְׁבִּ֥יתוּ <WH7673> ye shall put away שְּׂאֹ֖ר <WH7603> leaven מִבָּתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH1004> out of your houses כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <WH398> for whosoever eateth חָמֵ֗ץ <WH2557> leavened bread וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <WH3772> shall be cut הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> that soul הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> off from Israel מִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשֹׁ֖ן <WH7223> from the first עַד־ <WH5704> until י֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <WH7637> until the seventh

וּבַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> And in the first מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> [there shall be] an holy וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and in the seventh מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> there shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלָאכָה֙ <WH4399> to you no manner of work לֹא־ <WH3808> no יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shall be done בָהֶ֔ם אַ֚ךְ <WH389> in them save אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what יֵאָכֵ֣ל <WH398> must eat לְכָל־ <WH3605> every נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> [that] which every man ה֥וּא <WH1931> that לְבַדּ֖וֹ <WH905> alone יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that only may be done לָכֶֽם׃

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֮ <WH8104> And ye shall observe אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצּוֹת֒ <WH4682> [the feast of] unleavened bread כִּ֗י <WH3588> for בְּעֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> for in this selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> have I brought אֶת־ <WH853> צִבְאוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6635> your armies מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֞ם <WH8104> therefore shall ye observe אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1755> in your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

בָּרִאשֹׁ֡ן <WH7223> In the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> four עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> teen י֤וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> of the month בָּעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> at even תֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> ye shall eat מַצֹּ֑ת <WH4682> unleavened bread עַ֠ד <WH5704> until י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָאֶחָ֧ד <WH259> until the one וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> and twentieth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> at even

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> Seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days שְׂאֹ֕ר <WH7603> shall there be no leaven לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall be no יִמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> found בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH1004> in your houses כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <WH398> for whosoever eateth מַחְמֶ֗צֶת <WH2557> leaven וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> even that soul הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> he מֵעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> from the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> whether he be a stranger וּבְאֶזְרַ֥ח <WH249> or born הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

כָּל־ <WH3605> anything מַחְמֶ֖צֶת <WH2557> leaven לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> Ye shall eat בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4186> in all your habitations תֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> shall ye eat מַצּֽוֹת׃ <WH4682> unleavened bread פ

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Then Moses לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> for all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to מִֽשְׁכ֗וּ <WH4900> unto them Draw out וּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> and take לָכֶ֥ם צֹ֛אן <WH6629> you a lamb לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4940> according to your families וְשַׁחֲט֥וּ <WH7819> and kill הַפָּֽסַח׃ <WH6453> the passover

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֞ם <WH3947> And ye shall take אֲגֻדַּ֣ת <WH92> a bunch אֵז֗וֹב <WH231> of hyssop וּטְבַלְתֶּם֮ <WH2881> and dip בַּדָּ֣ם <WH1818> [it] in the blood אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בַּסַּף֒ <WH5592> that [is] in the bason וְהִגַּעְתֶּ֤ם <WH5060> and strike אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּשְׁקוֹף֙ <WH4947> the lintel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and the two הַמְּזוּזֹ֔ת <WH4201> side posts מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> with the blood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּסָּ֑ף <WH5592> that [is] in the bason וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵצְא֛וּ <WH3318> of you shall go out אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and none מִפֶּֽתַח־ <WH6607> at the door בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> of his house עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

וְעָבַ֣ר <WH5674> will pass through יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> For the LORD לִנְגֹּ֣ף <WH5062> to smite אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4713> Egyptian וְרָאָ֤ה <WH7200> and when he seeth אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמַּשְׁק֔וֹף <WH4947> upon the lintel וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> over שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and on the two הַמְּזוּזֹ֑ת <WH4201> side posts וּפָסַ֤ח <WH6452> will pass over יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> over הַפֶּ֔תַח <WH6607> the door וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> and will not יִתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and will not suffer הַמַּשְׁחִ֔ית <WH7843> the destroyer לָבֹ֥א <WH935> to come אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם <WH1004> in unto your houses לִנְגֹּֽף׃ <WH5062> to smite

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> And ye shall observe אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this לְחָק־ <WH2706> for an ordinance לְךָ֥ וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> to thee and to thy sons עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> And it shall come to pass when ye be come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> to the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> will give יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָכֶ֖ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> you according as he hath promised וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> that ye shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> this service הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise
